name: Perception Saga
description:
Warning: This is a very early stage prototype, please keep that in mind while testing it.

Prepare to lose your mind!

Perception Saga is a strange synesthesic adventure to a land of abstract sounds and visual effects.

In this gameplay prototype you have access to three levels of increasing difficulty. You are advised to play with good headphones in a calm environment.

This game only uses the three direction keys: up left and right.

This prototype was created during the 2014 Global Game Jam and I plan to resume working on this idea.

It has been made with the Löve framework.

If you have any request or comment, please feel free to comment or review on this page.
